properties.displayName: MDE Alert - Suspicious System Owner/User Discovery
properties.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName == "Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection"
| extend ep=parse_json(ExtendedProperties)
| extend MitreTechnique = ep.["MitreTechniques"]
| where AlertName == "Suspicious System Owner/User Discovery"
| where MitreTechnique == "T1033;T1069;T1087;T1087.001;T1087.002"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Microsoft Defender for Endpoint Alert - Suspicious System Owner/User Discovery
